Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: Ankur Mathur "Anks329"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a birthday present for myself and it has been wonderful. The small compact size of it is the best point. It is small enough to comfortably fit in my jeans pocket along with my cell phone. The screen is bright, and you have a lot of options that you can change without digging through the menu. For example, you can easily change the picture quality, flash mode, ISO speed, and a couple of other things that I can't remember right now.The downside, is the size. With a camera this slim and small, it's occasionally hard to hold it steady enough (depends on the lighting on how long the shutter is open). But I've gotten a couple of blurry pictures  because I hit the trigger too hard and it made it slightly blurry. The anti shake works, but not always.Overall, the camera is great, and I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Bill Hellyer "billhe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a few weeks ago and it has been great.  Im still playing with it a lot, checking out all the cool settings.  The camera is small, sleak, and looks great.  It easily fits in a pocket for carrying.  The camera was also a very reasonable price considering the great quality.  The megapixel and resolution is very nice.  So far i really love this camera.  All my friends have been impressed with it as well.  I would definatly buy one again if I had to.

Reviews.Title: this camera rocks!!
Reviews.Author: Kristophe Seydel "chocoleche"
Reviews.Content: this is the best camera in the world! it's so small and looks cool too. I just throw it in my pocket and take it everywhere with me. it's easy to use and the photo/video quality is pristine. not to mention how easy it is to upload the images to my mac, I just plug it in and it automatically puts everything into a new folder. it also asks if you want to clear all the uploaded files from the camera so that it's ready for the next run. absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: Proprietary USB Cable
Reviews.Author: drbobo
Reviews.Content: Great camera with ONE exception!The USB cable is proprietary. While the camera input sort of looks like a mini-USB, it is NOT!Come on Casio! I am glad you dumped the dock but where is USB!!!

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim is Excellent
Reviews.Author: R. J. Soranno
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Casio Exilim Ex-S10 for the office. I like its small size, yet the LCD screen is huge! The camera is light, easy to use, and has all of the features one could want, including a 3x zoom, all for a very reasonable price. I don't think you can find a better 10 MP camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: casio camera
Reviews.Author: Ester Gabriel
Reviews.Content: arrived promptly and in excellent condition; so far I have not had any mechanical problems w/ it. It takes great pictures. I especially like the big screen.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Casio makes great cameras for the price, and this one is no exception. Got all the features I wanted, and very straightforward to use.

Reviews.Title: El articulo perfecto
Reviews.Author: Siul Vidal
Reviews.Content: El articulo perfecto. Me gusto bastante. Lo recomiendo 100%. Es de buena calidad. Si volvería a comprarle a este vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Excellent..
Reviews.Author: Cesar Rojas "Pitbull_inc"
Reviews.Content: Very good product, quality and finish.. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. ..

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Beamer
Reviews.Content: Nice camera easy to use. Lasted a while, picture quality is very good. Overall al very good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: basieswings
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as soon as it came out. It takes clear, sharp pictures and turns on quickly. I timed it myself and I turned the camera on AND took a picture in under 2 seconds. I would have given it five stars, but after 2 years of use, the camera quit focusing at all, making it pretty much unusable. I did love it while it lasted, though.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX -S10SR
Reviews.Author: Jorge Campos
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera back in 2008. So far the camera has met almost every expectation I had and the description of what it does. It is a great little camera that easily fits in my jean pocket without creating a large bulge. It's discreet, easy to carry, and easy to operate. I like the configuration of the buttons and how they're arranged. There are a lot of features to adjust the picture quality and effects.If you say you know how to use a camera, but you're asking yourself or others how to improve the quality by adjusting sharpness, contrast, and saturation then you probably don't know how to adjust the picture quality on a TV either. This camera has a lot of settings to enable the user to get their desired picture quality as close as possible if not better. Look to get at least a 4gb SD card with it if you want the most out of your pictures. I put on a screen protector on the lcd display and got a case to carry it around. It has the most minute(small) scratches on it that i'm not even sure it is a scratch (looking at it right now)...This is a warning though! Be very careful of not bumping the LCD display, it is very fragile and if medium to moderate force is applied to the screen, it will damage it. I used to have an S600 exilim and it had a hairline crack after i accidently bumped it against the side edge of my desk. It wasn't a hard hit since all i did was move the camera,  but caught it at the edge of the desk.

Reviews.Title: very nice compact camera, the best ever, nice pic & video
Reviews.Author: T. Mejder "taty"
Reviews.Content: Guys, this camera is the best choice, I tell you!!! I've been already on vacation with this camera in Colorado, Rocky Mountains. Very nice pic. We took also very good pictures in the clubs of Manhattan. All pictures were top. How says that the pic of this camera are not good, he can not use really this cute thing. Design is awesome.

Reviews.Title: picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Wow this camera is definitly great, I love it! It takes great pictures VERY clear and the camera itself is sleek and slim. Everyone comments on how "nice" it is and how "clear" the pictures are. I certainly recommend it for anyone looking to buy a digital camera.. you're money will be well spent!

Reviews.Title: casio
Reviews.Author: Christina E. Bowery
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about a month ago and absolutely love it. It's so small and takes really nice photos. Everyone loves it and is always asking about where I got it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Non-tech "Non-techy"
Reviews.Content: I very much wanted to like this camera. It's so small and portable and Consumer Reports ranked it very high. Unfortunately, the picture quality is poor. Low light pictures are very grainy and even in bright sunlight, pictures are dull and washed out. I'm not a novice with cameras and I've tried manually adjusting the settings but get the same mediocre results. It's small and has great battery life, so very casual users will probably be fine with the mediocre pictures. But if you want to capture quality photos and stay digital, get a Nikon or Canon DSLR. I use a Nikon D40 and the images are in a different league.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Zambrano
Reviews.Content: The camera is AWESOME... I'm soo happy with my purchase... the pictures are incredible and the camera is too thin and light... I recomend it to everyone who want a great pictures and a great camera!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
10mp with 3x zoom
Auto shutter
You Tube ready
Instant video button
Face detection
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-S10SR 10MP 3x Zoom 2.7-Inch LCD Screen Digital Camera (Silver)
